alert.note: Alert for Grant Grove Area; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 10 at 12:44PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Tulare and eastern Fresno Counties through 115 PM PDT... At 1243 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm about 17 miles north of Three Rivers. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Tulare and eastern Fresno Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Grant Grove Area; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP
